Description:
Write clean code to develop functional web applications.
Locate common flaws in existing and under-development applications through periodic software maintenance activities.
Inspect each stage of a software development project from the start to the end through planned implementation.
Work with developers, designers and system administrators to identify new features
Work with the software maintenance team to fix errors and eliminate bugs in the desired website applications.
Develop a straightforward design plan that includes all necessary parameters for initiating the project effectively.Skills
Skills:
Experienced developer with corporate exposure related to back-end development activities and responsibilities.
Prior experience in using detailed knowledge of computer languages for development activities.
Acquainted with the utility of front-end computer programming languages.
Thorough knowledge of planning, analysis, design, testing, and implementation of an all-inclusive website project.
Formal technical education in computing courses like CS or CE.
Sound command of SQL and other database system concepts through practical exposure or professional course-based education.
Knowledge in:  1- NodeJS, nest framework. 2- AWS Knowledge. 3- Open Search/Elastic Search knowledge. 4- Integration knowledge XML, RestFull. 5- Dynamo DB, Monogo & RDBMS.
